Actions.Name: Mud Spray
Actions.Description: A foe in range is weakened. Weakened foes take 4 damage.

Actions.Name: Mudslide
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 3, then creates a terrain effect in the spaces it just passed through. The effect is difficult terrain, and characters other than [name]s that enter the space for the first time on their turn or start their turn there must save or slip and be shoved 2 in a direction of the [name]'s choice.
